:CodeSample: Assets Assets.Type ### Simple Asset Browser A full asset browser might have a few more features, but here's a quick and dirty window that will provide a filtered list of the current live assets!
![An overly simple asset browser window]({{site.screen_url}}/TinyAssetBrowser.jpg)
:CodeSample: AppFocus SK.AppFocus ### Checking for changes in application focus
